    Create And Sell Your NFTs

    Set Up Your Wallet

    Once you've set up your wallet of choise, connect it to OpenSea by clicking the wallect icon in the top right corner. Learn about the wallets We Support.

    Create Your Collection

    Click My Collection and set your collection. Add social links, a description, profile & banner images, and set a secondary sales fee.

    Add Your NFTs

    Upload your work (image, video, audio, or 3D art), add a title and description, and customize your NFTs with properties, start, and unlockable content

    List Then For Sale

    Choose between auctions, fixed-price listings, and declining-price listings. You choose how you want to sell your NFTs, and we help you sell them .
